casebody.data:
EDWIN M. WILMER vs. THE BALTIMORE TRUST COMPANY, Committee.

The cause was argued, together with that next preceding, before Boyd, C. J., Briscoe, Thomas, Pattison, Urner, Adkins, and Offutt, JJ.

David Ash, for the appellant. S. Ralph, Warnken and Francis B. Wiers, for the appellee. Decided January 19th, 1923. Boyd, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, for which see the next preceding case, In the Matter of Philip Morboume Micholas.

Order of May 11th, 1922, and decree of May 16th, 1922, affirmed and caused remanded, Edwin M. Wilmer, individually, to pay the costs.
